00009 namespace MVCWebComponents;
00010 
00019 class ClassRegistry {
00020         
00030         protected static $register = array();
00031         
00039         public static function exists($class) {
00040                 
00041                 return isset($register[$class]);
00042                 
00043         }
00044         
00052         public static function register($class) {
00053                 
00054                 if(is_object($class)) self::$register[get_class($class)] =& $class;
00055                 else self::$register[$class] = new $class;
00056                 
00057         }
00058         
00066         public static function &get($className) {
00067                 
00068                 if(!self::exists($className)) self::register($className);
00069                 return self::$register[$className];
00070                 
00071         }
00072         
00080         public static function remove($className) {
00081                 
00082                 if(self::exists($className)) unset(self::$register[$className]);
00083                 
00084         }
00085         
00086 }
